original_text: If the priest's daughter also be married unto a stranger, she may not eat of an offering of the holy things.
korean_text: 제사장의 딸이 일반인에게 출가하였으면 거제의 성물을 먹지 못하되

sentences.original_text: If a priest's daughter also be married unto a stranger
she may not eat of an offering of holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 거룩한 것의 제물을 먹을 수 없다
